text: Yesh Atid () is an Israeli political party. == Background == The Yesh Atid was founded in 2012. == Ideology == The party is centrist, Zionist, secular and social liberal. The party's leader is Yair Lapid, who was the Prime Minister of Israel from July 2022 to December 2022. == Today == The party's number of seats in the 25th Knesset: 24 (+7). It was part of the Bennett-Lapid Government. == Other websites == * Category:2012 establishments in Israel Category:Liberal parties Category:Political parties in Israel Category:Zionist parties
title: Yesh Atid
